student.name: PIYUSH LAL SHRESTHA
student.bio: A versatile individual passionate about technology, innovation, ideation, and management, driven by a thirst for learning. Interested in music, art, coding, and gaming, who is dedicated to improvement despite occasional procrastination.
student.skill: A team player with software expertise, enhancing corporate operations and prioritizing organizational growth & visibility.
